tuv.seg: Diplomatic supports for Irish people abroad
Tacaíocht taidhleoireachta d'Éireannaigh thar lear
If you are in need of advice or assistance while you are abroad, you can call on the Irish embassy or consulate in that country
Má theastaíonn comhairle nó cúnamh uait agus tú thar lear, is féidir glaoch ar Ambasáid nó Consalacht na hÉireann sa tír sin
There are Irish embassies and consulates-general located in countries throughout the world
Tá ambasáid agus consalachtaí-ginearálta suit i dtíortha eagsúla ar fud an domhain
If you are in a country where there is no embassy or consulate, you may look for advice and assistance from embassies or consulates of other European Union countries
Más i dtír thú nach bhfuil aon ambasád ná consalacht ann, is féidir leat comhairle agus cúnamh a lorg ó ambasáid nó consalacht de chuid tíortha eile an Chomhphobail
Embassies and consulates can be of assistance if:
Is féidir le hambasáid nó consalachtaí cúnamh a thabhairt:
• You need an emergency passport
• Má theastaíonn pas éigeandála uait
• You have been the victim of crime or illness or have had a serious accident
• Má tá tú thíos le coir, nó tinneas ort, nó má tharla drochthimpiste duit
• You have been arrested or imprisoned while abroad
• Má gabhadh thú nó má cuireadh sa phríosún thar lear thú
• You need help in transferring funds from home where more conventional means are not available
• Má theastaíonn uait airgead a aistriú ón mbaile nuair nach féidir leat úsáid a bhaint as na gnáthbhealaí
• There is a death abroad and the remains need to be returned to Ireland
• Má cailltear duine thar lear agus teastaíonn an corp a thabhairt abhaile go hÉirinn
There is a limit to the services the embassy or consulate can provide
Tá na seirbhísí gur féidir le hambasáid nó consalacht teoranta
For example, if you have been ill or in an accident, they can:
Mar shampla, má tá duine tinn nó má bhí drochthimpiste ag duine is féidir leo:
• Inform family or friends about your accident or illness
• Insint don teaghlach nó do chairde faoin timpiste nó tinneas
• Advise on local medical services and lists of English-speaking doctors
• Comhairle a thabhairt ar sheirbhísí leighis áitiúil agus liosta dochtúirí le Béarla a chur ar fáil
• Liaise with local medical services on your behalf
• Dealáil leis na seirbhísí áitiúla leighis ar do shon
They cannot, however, offer medical advice, pay medical bills or pursue compensation claims on your behalf
Ní féidir leo, áfach, comhairle leighis a chur ar fáil, billí leighis a íoc nó iarratais ar chúiteamh a dhéanamh ar do shon
Nor will they be able to pay for relatives to come to see you
Ní féidir leo ach an oiread íoc as gaolta teacht ar cuairt chugat

Further information about the range of services relating to the consular protection of Irish citizens is available from the Consular Section of the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade – see 'Where to apply' below
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi na seirbhísí maidir le cosaint consulacha ar fáil ón Rannóg Consulachta na Roinne Gnóthaí Eachtracha agus Trádála – féach ‘Cá háit a dhéanfaidh mé iarratas’
The Department has also developed a free smartphone app called TravelWise which has travel advice and consular information on 200 countries
Forbraíodh an Roinn aip fóin cliste saor in aisce ar a dtugtar TravelWise go bhfuil comhairle taistil agus faisnéis chonsalach le haghaidh 200 tír aici
The app is available from the Apple and Android stores
Tá an aip ar fáil ó stórtha Apple agus Android
Repatriation of Irish people from abroad
Aisdúichiú daoine Éireannacha ó áiteanna thar lear

In very exceptional circumstances, where the health or security of an Irish citizen abroad is at risk and there is no way of dealing with the situation satisfactorily locally, the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade may agree to repatriate the person to Ireland

I gcúinsí fíor-eisceachtúla, ina bhfuil sláinte nó sábháilteacht shaoránach Éireannach thar lear i mbaol agus nach bhfuil aon slí le déileáil leis an scéal go háitiúil ar bhealach sásúil, d’fhéadfadh an Roinn Gnóthaí Eachtracha agus Trádála in Éirinn a bheith sásta an duine a aisdúichiú go hÉireann
This will be done at the sole discretion of the Department
Beidh sé faoi lánrogha na Roinne é seo a dhéanamh
In addition, repatriation in this instance is subject to strict conditions which will be set out and explained clearly in each individual case
Chomh maith leis sin, tá aisdúichiú sa chás seo faoi réir coinníollacha dochta a leagfar amach agus a mhíneofar go soiléir i ngach cás ar leith
The conditions include a written undertaking to repay all the expenses incurred as well as a statutory fee for this service
Cuimsíonn na coinníollacha gealltanas scríofa go n-aisíocfar na costais go léir a thabhaítear chomh maith le táille reachtúil ar an seirbhís seo
